templates.template:
<svg id="die_svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="61px" height="67px">
<xen:if is="{$user.user_id} == 77">
	<xen:set var="$dice">100</xen:set>
</xen:if>
<title>{$dice}</title>
	<style>
		.top_face path
		{
			fill:{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property diceRollerDie.background-color}', 'lighten', 10};
		}
		.top_face #roll
		{
			fill:{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property diceRollerDie.color}', 'lighten', 20};
			stroke:{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property diceRollerDie.color}', 'lighten', 15};
			stroke-width: 1;
			stroke-opacity:0.5;
		}
		.back_face path
		{
			fill:{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property diceRollerDie.background-color}', 'darken', 5};
		}
		.back_face .pip
		{
			fill:{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property diceRollerDie.color}', 'lighten', 5};
			stroke:{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property diceRollerDie.color}', 'lighten', 0};
			stroke-width: 1;
			stroke-opacity:0.5;
		}
		.front_face path
		{
			fill:{xen:property diceRollerDie.background-color};
		}
		.front_face .pip
		{
			fill:{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property diceRollerDie.color}', 'lighten', 10};
			stroke:{xen:helper playwithcolors, '{xen:property diceRollerDie.color}', 'lighten', 5};
			stroke-width: 1;
			stroke-opacity:0.5;
		}		
	</style>

	<g id="die">
		<g class="background">
			<path
				d="M3 11 L58 24 L51 54 L18 65 L17 65 L1 38 Z"
				style="fill:{xen:property diceRollerDie.border-color}"
			/>
		</g>
		<g class="top_face">
			<path
				d="M3 11 L21 35 L58 24 L36 0 Z"
			/>
			<text id="roll" text-anchor="middle"
				x="29" y="22"
				transform="rotate(-17.5 39.5 29.5) skewX(18)"
				font-family="Verdana"
				{xen:if '{$dice} < 100', 'font-weight="bold"'}
				font-size="20px"
			>
			{$dice}
			</text>
		</g>
		<g class="back_face">
			<path
				d="M3 12 L20 36 L17 65 L1 38 Z"			
			/>
			<circle class="pip"
				cx="0" cy="0" r="3"
				transform="skewX(-10) skewY(35) translate(17 26)"
			/>
		</g>
		<g class="front_face">
			<path
				d="M22 36 L58 25 L51 54 L18 65 Z"
			/>
			<circle class="pip"
				cx="0" cy="0" r="3.25"
				transform="skewX(-10) skewY(-8) translate(36 46)"
			/>
			<circle class="pip"
				cx="0" cy="0" r="2.5"
				transform="skewX(-10) skewY(-8) translate(55 42)"
			/>
			<circle class="pip"
				cx="0" cy="0" r="2.5"
				transform="skewX(-10) skewY(-8) translate(35.5 61)"
			/>
			<circle class="pip"
				cx="0" cy="0" r="2"
				transform="skewX(-10) skewY(-8) translate(54.5 57)"
			/>
		</g>
	</g>
</svg>
{xen:phrase cz_rpg_user_threw_dice, "user={$message.username}", "faces={$diceRoll.faces}", "reason={$diceRoll.reason}"} {xen:phrase cz_rpg_total}: {$diceRoll.total}

<form action="{xen:link 'dice/add', $post}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" id="DiceRollForm"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase cz_rpg_throwing_a_dice_for} ... </dt> <dd><input id="diceReason" name="diceReason" type="text" value="" class="textCtrl" maxlength="30" /></dd> </dl> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase cz_rpg_faces}</dt> <dd><input id="diceFaces" name="diceFaces" type="text" value="6" class="textCtrl" /></dd> </dl> <dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <button id="throwDiceBtn" type="submit" class="button primary">{xen:phrase cz_rpg_throw_a_dice}</button> </dd> </dl> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
